input_args.passage: 'Mitchell, Elizabeth | Maine | “Libby” Mitchell was born in South Carolina, but her hometown is Vassalboro. She attended Furman University for her B.A.; University of North Carolina at Chapel ...'
input_args.claim: 'The source also mentions her roles as the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and as President of the Maine Senate (2008–2010) which makes her the first woman in the United States to have held both positions, and the third person ever to do so.'
